name: grpsgrp

stmt.origin: syl(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c0, csgrp), wcel(c0, cmnd))
stmt.pretty: syl(c0 ∈ Grp, c0 ∈ SGrp, c0 ∈ Mnd)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c0, csgrp))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c0, cmnd))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c0, csgrp))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ Grp → c0 ∈ SGrp)
⊣ (c0 ∈ Grp → c0 ∈ Mnd)
⊣ (c0 ∈ Mnd → c0 ∈ SGrp)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c0, csgrp))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c0, cmnd))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c0, csgrp))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ Grp → c0 ∈ SGrp)
⊣ (c0 ∈ Grp → c0 ∈ Mnd)
⊣ (c0 ∈ Mnd → c0 ∈ SGrp)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c0, csgrp))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c0, csgrp))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ Grp → c0 ∈ SGrp)
⊣ (c0 ∈ Mnd → c0 ∈ SGrp)

comment: A group is a semigroup. (Contributed by AV, 28-Aug-2021.)
